3040331000.name: Bobobo-bo Bo-bobo
3040331000.comment: As far as we could discern, the man of legends appeared without warning in our world. Based on the portraits painted of him, he wore a suit of the most sacred blue and had a head of shining blonde hair, often depicted as a halo. His divine features imply the possibility that he was revered as a figure of worship, especially considering the absurd miracles he was claimed to have been responsible for. Regardless of speculation, it is certain that his god-like deeds of valor earned him the title "Noble Warrior of Love," and that he spent his days battling evil and saving innocents.—An excerpt from The Code of Heroes, The Blonde Hero Clad in Blue (Volume 1)
